subject: [Radiance-general] dxf2rad
body:
hi Erwin

i can't make anything useful out of the linux binary for mac osx so
far as I can see

i'm using Vectorworks

i don't think there can be a route from Vectorworks to a rad file.

i assume the way to go is to make a dxf file of a Vectorworks model

if you have a dxf converter which would work on a mac, that would be
terrific !

is it a command line utility ?

tom
